billEvents.eventText: referred to libraries and education technology

title: Creates the Orangetown public library district; repealer
summary: Creates the Orangetown public library district; modifies the boundaries; authorizes individual libraries to apply for appropriations on an individual basis.
actClause: AN ACT to create the Orangetown public library district and to repeal chapter 349 of the laws of 1973, relating to creating a library district in the town of Orangetown in the county of Rockland
